item.title: Refactoring: If this, then that
item.description: Step 1: Setup your Test Harness Tests stop you from falling off the cliff face. Snapshot tests Adapting existing tests Uncle bob: As the tests become more specific, the code becomes more general Step 2: Recognise code smells Mysterious name: Variable, Method, or Class with unclear purpose Change Function declaration Rename varible Rename field Duplicated code: Duplicated code structures Extract function Slide statements Pull up method Long function: Hard to understand function
